title: Arnon Milchan
snippet: Arnon Milchan owns film and TV production company New Regency Enterprises.

title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: Therefore, Regency International Pictures became the holding company for all Milchan’s investments and was legally renamed as Regency Enterprises (doing business as Arnon Milchan Enterprises) and two new companies (both 100% held by Regency Enterprises) were established to produce movies: one to do business in the United States and legally named Regency Entertainment (USA), Inc., one to do business overseas and legally named Monarchy Enterprises S.á.r.l.

title: About | Regency Enterprises
snippet: Yariv Milchan (PRODUCER) is the Chairman and CEO of the Academy Award®-winning New Regency Productions where he oversees the day-to-day management, creative direction, and overall growth strategy of the company.

title: Regency Enterprises - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Regency Enterprises is an American film production company formed in 1991 as a joint venture between Arnon Milchan, Scriba & Deyle and Canal+ to finance 20 films in five years, with New Regency Productions acting as its production and sales arm. The company was originally known as Embassy International Pictures from 1982 until 1991.
